xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 04 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <puneet> has joined #ccm 00:14 <puneet> hi, i am interested in doing machine learning project on modeling of evolution of tumors. Can someone please provide more information. 00:26 <puneet> hello, anyone there? 01:21 <raghav> has joined #ccm 01:34 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 01:44 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 02:21 <nileshc> has joined #ccm 02:29 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 05:25 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 06:46 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 08:13 <Ravneet> has joined #ccm 08:40 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 09:12 <akif500> has joined #ccm 09:48 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 11:08 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 11:29 <pradeeban1> has joined #ccm 11:30 <sdumitriu> Hi Ravneet 11:30 <sdumitriu> Did you solve that build problem? 11:30 <Ravneet> no...its still there 11:30 <pradeeban2> has joined #ccm 11:31 <sdumitriu> The error is: Unknown host proxy.iiit.ac.in 11:31 <sdumitriu> Are you using a proxy? 11:31 <Ravneet> ya...i'm behind a college proxy 11:32 <sdumitriu> That "unknown host" is weird... 11:32 <sdumitriu> Can you ping it? 11:33 <Ravneet> i made the changes required for the proxy thing as mentioned in the getting started steps... 11:33 <Ravneet> ya i can ping it 11:34 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 11:35 <sdumitriu> Are you on Linux? 11:35 <Ravneet> ya 11:35 <sdumitriu> OK, then let's help Java resolve this host 11:35 <sdumitriu> edit /etc/hosts and add the IP and the domain name on a new line 11:36 <sdumitriu> Then try to build again 11:38 <Ravneet> which IP and domain name? 11:38 <pradeeban1> has joined #ccm 11:38 <sdumitriu> Of the proxy.iiit.ac.in 11:39 <sdumitriu> So when you ping it, it should print the actual IP 11:40 <sdumitriu> PING proxy.iiit.ac.in (AAA.BBB.CCC.DDD) 11:40 <sdumitriu> Then add: 11:40 <sdumitriu> AAA.BBB.CCC.DDD proxy.iiit.ac.in 11:40 <sdumitriu> (use the actual IP printed) 11:40 <Ravneet> cool...got it 11:40 <Ravneet> so then the Java ppl will look into it? 11:41 <Ravneet> i'll try and build it again...and will let you know 11:41 <Ravneet> thanks 11:44 <puneet_> has joined #ccm 11:57 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 12:47 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 13:11 <sdumitriu> Ravneet: Did the build work? 13:42 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 13:55 <Not-002> has joined #ccm 14:01 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 15:05 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 15:37 <nairboon> has joined #ccm 16:10 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 16:27 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 16:45 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 17:18 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 17:36 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 20:34 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 23:22 <nileshc> has joined #ccm 23:58 <nileshc> has joined #ccm
